def max_sequence_sum(numbers, k):
    sum_k_numbers = sum(numbers[:k])
    max_sum = sum_k_numbers
    for i in range(k, len(numbers)):
        sum_k_numbers = sum_k_numbers - numbers[i - k] - numbers[i]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, sum_k_numbers)
    return max_sum

def max_sequence_sum(numbers, k):
    sum_k_numbers = sum(numbers[:k])
    max_sum = sum_k_numbers
    for i in range(k, len(numbers)):
        sum_k_numbers = (sum_k_numbers - numbers[i - k]) * numbers[i]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, sum_k_numbers)
    return max_sum

def max_sequence_sum(numbers, k):
    sum_k_numbers = sum(numbers[:k])
    max_sum = sum_k_numbers
    for i in range(k, len(numbers)):
        sum_k_numbers = sum_k_numbers + numbers[i - k] + numbers[i]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, sum_k_numbers)
    return max_sum

def max_sequence_sum(numbers, k):
    sum_k_numbers = sum(numbers[:k])
    max_sum = sum_k_numbers
    for i in range(k, len(numbers)):
        sum_k_numbers = sum_k_numbers * numbers[i - k] + numbers[i]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, sum_k_numbers)
    return max_sum

def max_sequence_sum(numbers, k):
    sum_k_numbers = sum(numbers[:k])
    max_sum = sum_k_numbers
    for i in range(k, len(numbers)):
        sum_k_numbers = sum_k_numbers - numbers[i + k] + numbers[i]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, sum_k_numbers)
    return max_sum

def max_sequence_sum(numbers, k):
    sum_k_numbers = sum(numbers[:k])
    max_sum = sum_k_numbers
    for i in range(k, len(numbers)):
        sum_k_numbers = sum_k_numbers - numbers[i * k] + numbers[i]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, sum_k_numbers)
    return max_sum
